text: Trying not to kill myself at  pmBit of back story to explain why I feel like I do   I m   years old  had numerous years of physical and mental abuse from pretty much everyone who s supposed to love and support me  It s left me with so much mental scarring and actual scars that I m barely recognisable compared to my younger self  Recently I ve tried and tried to be strong  but I just can t anyone more  I guess I m just not as strong as I once was  Maybe loosing everything that made you happy does that to you  On the  nd August   I lost my family  girlfriend and my son  This was bad enough and I literally destroyed my arms with bits of glass  cried endlessly for weeks and then I was able to see my son again  things started looking up again and I managed to get another girlfriend on the  th November   This period was great I guess  I still felt depressed but not like this  I then was denied any sort of access to my son and my new girlfriend asked for space due to personal issues with our relationship  This happened on the  st January   Since then I ve been unable to eat anything at all for   days and unable to sleep  I ve cried endlessly and tried messaging the girl I was with to apologise and beg her for a second chance  Which meant she ended up blocking me  All the while she still maintains we are in a relationship  Yet it doesn t seem like that to me  Right now I just feel so down  so bad and regret everything  I already made up my mind this morning that I wanted to die  I just can t cope anymore with all the heartbreak and the endless pain I go through on a daily basis  I am just so sick and tired of it and I feel like death is the only option I have now  Like I can t do anything else
summary: After losing his family girlfriend and his son, he is depressed and suicidal. He wants to kill himself as he can't cope with all the heartbreak and pain he goes through every day. He feels like death is the only option he has now.
